attributes.action: Restore faith to British Parliamentary democracy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the light of the recent and ongoing scandal of MP's expenses call upon the Prime Minister to hold a General Election in order to demonstrate his understanding of the need restore faith and understanding to the British electorate in British Parliamentary democracy.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
